opis: KUĆA, PRODAJA, DUBROVNIK, KONAVLE, CAVTAT 230 m2 Prodaje se kuća u Cavtatu, naselje Mećajac koja se nalazi u ulici Stjepana Radića. Okrenuta je prema jugu te iz kuće se proteže predivan pogled prema moru. Kuća se sastoji od dvije etaže : PRIZEMLJE : dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, soba, hodnik i wc KAT : master spavaća soba s walk-in ormarom i svojom kupaonicom, dvije spavaće sobe, kupaonica, hodnik i terasa Kuća je građena kvalitetno 2002.godine te je obložena bračkim kamenom. Sastoji se od dva kata te postoji mogućnost dizanja još jednog kata te uvučenog potkrovlja. Površina dvorišta iznosi 282 m2. Ispred kuće se nalaze 2 garaže te je mogućnost parkinga još 5 automobila. Mogućnost bazena u dvorištu. Kuća se nalazi na sjajnoj lokaciji u neposrednoj blizini mora, trgovine te javnog prijevoza. Zbog svoje pozicije i dobrog rasporeda kuća je pogodna i za izradu više apartmana u svrhe dnevnog najma. Vlasništvo uredno. HOUSE, FOR SALE, DUBROVNIK, KONAVLE, CAVTAT 230 m2 A house is for sale in Cavtat, in the Mećajac settlement, located on Stjepan Radić Street. It faces south and offers a beautiful sea view. The house consists of two floors: GROUND FLOOR: living room with kitchen and dining area, bedroom, hallway, and toilet FIRST FLOOR: master bedroom with a walk-in closet and its own bathroom, two bedrooms, bathroom, hallway, and terrace The house was built with quality in 2002 and is clad in Brač stone. It consists of two floors with the possibility of adding another floor and an attic. The yard area is 282 m2. There are 2 garages in front of the house, with parking space for an additional 5 cars. Possibility of a pool in the yard. The house is located in a great location near the sea, shops, and public transport. Due to its position and good layout, the house is suitable for creating multiple apartments for daily rent. Ownership is clear.
